languages.text: "Катастрофы — это другое название новых возможностей. Надо просто не зевать".
"'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."
languages.original_text: "Катастрофы — это другое название новых возможностей. Надо просто не зевать".

traits.locale_text: "'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."
"'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."
"'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."
"'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."
"'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."
"'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."

languages.text: 「『災害』とは新たな機会を言い換えたものだ。それを見逃さないことが全てなのだ」
languages.original_text: "'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."

traits.locale_text: 「『災害』とは新たな機会を言い換えたものだ。それを見逃さないことが全てなのだ」

languages.text: “‘灾难’不过是‘机遇’的另一种说法。我们要抓住机遇，不能错过。”
languages.original_text: "'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."

traits.locale_text: “‘灾难’不过是‘机遇’的另一种说法。我们要抓住机遇，不能错过。”

languages.text: "Katastrophe' ist nur ein anderes Wort für eine neue Gelegenheit. Das Alte nicht zu vermissen, darum geht es."
languages.original_text: "'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."

traits.locale_text: "Katastrophe' ist nur ein anderes Wort für eine neue Gelegenheit. Das Alte nicht zu vermissen, darum geht es."

languages.text: « Le terme "désastre" n'est jamais qu'un synonyme de nouvelles opportunités, l'essentiel étant de ne pas passer à côté. »
languages.original_text: "'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."

traits.locale_text: « Le terme "désastre" n'est jamais qu'un synonyme de nouvelles opportunités, l'essentiel étant de ne pas passer à côté. »

languages.text: «"Desastre" no es más que otra palabra para definir una nueva oportunidad. La idea consiste precisamente en no evitarlo».
languages.original_text: "'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."

traits.locale_text: «"Desastre" no es más que otra palabra para definir una nueva oportunidad. La idea consiste precisamente en no evitarlo».

languages.text: "'Felaket', yeni fırsat ile eş anlamlıdır. Bütün mesele bu fırsatı değerlendirmektir."
languages.original_text: "'Disaster' is just another word for a new opportunity. Not missing it is what it's all about."

traits.locale_text: "'Felaket', 'yeni bir fırsat'ın eş anlamlısıdır. Bütün mesele onu kaçırmamaktır."
